name: Subfuse
description:
Submission for Bevy Jam #2.

There's a bug in the browser version where when first loaded, you may fall through the floor. If this happens, just refresh the page and it should work correctly.

Escape the hotel.

  • Press TAB to toggle menu
  • Interact: Left click
  • W/S/A/D to move
  • Shift to sprint

For better performance, use a native build rather than the web version. If running in browser, runs best in chrome/chromium. 

All assets were created for, and after the start of the game jam. (Music, sound fx, game levels, models, etc...)

https://github.com/DGriffin91/BevyJam2022-2

Collaboratively made by @Griffin, @tqwewe & Surreal.
